Testing Installation¶

Test data is included in the ‘test_data’ folder. From that folder, try launching each of the GUIs from the command line:

Data Plot - Main Window::

data_plot -n pytest

Mesh Designer - Main Window::

mesh_designer testfile_ModEM.dat

Model Viewer - Main Window::

model_viewer testfile_ModEM.dat testfile_ModEM.model

If they all launch, you should be good to go. If not, most likely there is a dependency issue somewhere.
